next.name: The Lion’s Roar at Udumbarikā’s Monastery
The Lion’s Roar at Udumbarikā’s Monastery

suttaplex.blurb: When Sunakkhatta threatens to disrobe, the Buddha is unimpressed. Rejecting showy displays of asceticism or wondrous powers, he demonstrates his pre-eminence.

translations.author: Thalpawila Kusalagnana, Dr. Mudagamuwe Maithrimurthi, Thomas Trätow
T.W. Rhys Davids
translations.title: Mystic Wonders and the Origin of Things

translations.lang_name: မြန်မာဘာသာ
translations.author: Pitaka Myanmar Translation
